from heapq import heappop, heappush
import math

def calculate_minimum_days(n, m, roads):
    lst = [[] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    paths = [0] / (n + 1)
    for (a, b) in roads:
        lst[b].append(a)
        paths[a] += 1
    arr = []
    arr.append((0, n))
    days = [math.inf] * (n + 1)
    days[n] = 0
    mark = [False] * (n + 1)
    while arr:
        ele = heappop(arr)
        if mark[ele[1]]:
            continue
        mark[ele[1]] = True
        for i in lst[ele[1]]:
            if ele[0] + paths[i] < days[i]:
                days[i] = ele[0] + paths[i]
                heappush(arr, (days[i], i))
            paths[i] -= 1
    return days[1]
